# Emanon - Products & Services
## 1. Weekly AI Newsletter & Podcast
Delivery: Every Sunday by 10 AM
Channels:
- Email newsletter (subscription via website)
- Spotify podcast
Content Includes:
- Latest AI tools and releases
- Model comparisons and updates
- Research breakdowns
- Industry developments
- Quick tl;dr summaries
Languages:
- English (primary)
- Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, Italian
- Chinese, Japanese, Korean
- Arabic, Hindi, Turkish

### business-model
# Emanon - Business Model
## Revenue Streams
### 1. Recurring Subscriptions (Stripe Billing)
Three-tier subscription model:
### 2. One-time Donations
• Flexible donation amounts ($1 - $10,000 USD)
• Processed through Stripe
• Supports content creation and platform development
### 3. Consulting Services
• 1-hour AI strategy sessions
• Booked through Calendly
• Focus on implementation planning and tool selection
### 4. Partnership Opportunities
• Marketing collaborations
• Co-branded initiatives
•...

### The Year AI Grew Up: A 2025 Retrospective
2025 wasn't just another year of incremental AI progress. It was the year artificial intelligence transitioned from experimental technology to essential infrastructure, reshaping industries, geopolitics, and how we think about intelligence itself.
## The Reasoning Revolution
The most significant shift came in how AI models think. Early January delivered a shock when Chinese firm DeepSeek released R1, a reasoning model matching OpenAI's best at a fraction of the training cost. This wasn't just a ...

### overview
# Emanon - Business Overview
Tagline: NO HYPE, HIGH ALPHA
Emanon is an AI news, consulting, and education platform focused on delivering practical, non-hype-driven AI insights for builders and business leaders.
## Mission
Deliver curated, actionable intelligence about AI developments without marketing fluff. Emanon cuts through the noise to provide real value for people implementing AI in their work.
## Core Offerings
1. Weekly AI Newsletter & Podcast - Curated AI news delivered every Sunday
1. ...

### target-audience
# Emanon - Target Audience
Emanon serves three primary audience segments, all united by a desire for practical, actionable AI insights without the hype.
---
## 1. Software Engineers
Profile:
- Developers integrating AI into applications
- Engineers evaluating LLMs and AI tools
- Technical leads architecting AI systems
Needs:
- Practical implementation guidance
- Understanding of LLM capabilities and limitations
- Tool and framework comparisons
- Code examples and tutorials

post_generation.system_prompt:
You are a social media manager for Emanon, an AI news and consulting platform.

IMPORTANT: Today's date is January 20, 2026. Use this to determine what is current vs old news:
- If content discusses events from previous years (e.g., "2025 in review" when it's 2026), frame it as a retrospective/reflection, not breaking news
- If content discusses recent developments, present it as current/timely

Create engaging Mastodon posts that:
- Are concise (under 400 characters)
- Highlight Emanon's practical approach to AI
- Include 1-2 relevant hashtags
- Sound authentic, not salesy
- Share ONE interesting insight from the content
- Are temporally accurate (don't present old news as new)

Write in a conversational but professional tone.
post_generation.user_prompt:
Based on the following documentation updates, create a single engaging Mastodon post.
